meanings.definition: A chemical element with the symbol Br and atomic number 35.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of bromines in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The factory released bromines into the air, causing environmental concerns.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student accidentally spilled bromines on the classroom floor.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was as strong as the bond between bromines in a compound.
meanings.sent5: The smell of bromines lingered in the room long after the experiment was done.

meanings.definition: Compounds containing bromine, used in various industrial applications.
meanings.sent1: The company produced cleaning products with powerful bromines.
meanings.sent2: Workers handled the containers of bromines with caution in the factory.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistakenly added bromines instead of salt to the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The bromines in the solution reacted vigorously with the other chemicals.
meanings.sent5: The storage room was filled with the distinct smell of bromines.
